query:
select
                 f.scopes,
                 f.grant_id as "grant_id!",
                 f.client_id,
                 g.user_id
             from auth_oauth_provider.flows f
             inner join auth_oauth_provider.grants g on f.grant_id = g.id
             where f.access_token = $1 and f.access_token_expires_at > now()
                   and grant_id is not null
